channel.title: 美联社

item.title: 最新消息：唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）和乔-拜登（Joe Biden）在密歇根州赢得初选。

item.title: 国家冰球联盟创纪录斗殴事件发生 20 年后，整个联盟的斗殴事件有所减少，但并没有减少。
item.description:
20 years since NHL's record-setting brawl, fighting is down across the league but not going anywhere https://t.co/npaPgh7KWD

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 旧金山的参事们周二正式向非裔美国人及其后代道歉，为该市在延续种族主义和歧视方面所扮演的角色道歉，其中几位参事表示，这只是对黑人居民赔偿的开始，而不是结束。
item.description:
Supervisors in San Francisco formally apologized Tuesday to African Americans and their descendants for the city’s role in perpetuating racism and discrimination, with several stating that this was just the start of reparations for Black residents and not the end. pic.twitter.com/2m4QW9P90W

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 在加沙地带的拉法，一家拥挤不堪的医院里的婴儿正在共用保温箱。该市目前约有 140 万人，其中许多人是在以色列-哈马斯战争期间逃离的，当时地面攻势主要集中在加沙北部和中部。
item.description:
Babies in an overcrowded hospital were sharing incubators in Rafah in the Gaza Strip.

The city is now home to about 1.4 million people, many of whom fled the Israel-Hamas war when the ground offensive was concentrated on northern and central Gaza. pic.twitter.com/HmTz7T5oOG

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 28, 2024

item.title: 丹妮尔-布鲁克斯希望 "改变游戏规则"。这位 34 岁的演员曾因出演《紫色》中的配角而获得奥斯卡提名，她希望在好莱坞扮演意想不到的角色。
item.description:
Danielle Brooks wants to "change the game." Oscar-nominated for her supporting role in "The Color Purple," the 34-year-old actor hopes to take on unexpected roles in Hollywood. pic.twitter.com/TtFcjmao5y

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) February 27, 2024

item.title: 普利策奖得主、美联社摄影师 Julio Cortez 将向您展示如何拍摄即将到来的日食。Julio 将分享拍摄日食的技巧和诀窍，随后还将进行问答。欲了解更多信息，包括如何注册：
item.description:
Pulitzer Prize-winning AP photographer Julio Cortez will show you how to capture the upcoming solar eclipse. Julio will share techniques and tips for capturing the eclipse followed by a Q&A session.

For more information, including how to register: https://t.co/O4JAXJvbeh

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 27, 2024

item.title: 奥斯卡获奖演员凯特-温斯莱特（Kate Winslet）经常利用自己的平台发表言论，她说自己在观看最佳女主角莉莉-格拉德斯通（Lily Gladstone）的 SAG 奖获奖感言时感动得热泪盈眶。温斯莱特本周在纽约首映了她的新剧 "The Regime"。
item.description:
Oscar-winning actor Kate Winslet, who often uses her platform to speak out, said she was moved to tears watching best actress Lily Gladstone’s SAG award acceptance speech. Winslet premiered her new limited series “The Regime” this week in New York. pic.twitter.com/BHT7DgSUgT

— AP Entertainment (@APEntertainment) February 27, 2024

item.title: 最新消息：两名男子在 2002 年杀害 Run-DMC 的 Jam Master Jay 一案中被定罪，这是嘻哈界最臭名昭著的谋杀案之一。
item.description:
BREAKING: Two men have been convicted in the 2002 killing of Run-DMC’s Jam Master Jay, one of the hip-hop world’s most infamous slayings. https://t.co/JqBMlQp24l

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 27, 2024

item.title: 动物学家证实，纽约市的名人猫头鹰弗拉科死于创伤性撞击，据报道它在飞入一栋大楼一天后死亡。目前正计划对这只欧亚鹰鸮进行进一步检测，以确定它是否生病。
item.description:
New York City’s celebrity owl Flaco died from a traumatic impact, zoologists confirmed, a day after he reportedly flew into a building. There is further testing planned to determine if the Eurasian eagle-owl may have been sick. pic.twitter.com/EEUy6OdZhO

— The Associated Press (@AP) February 27, 2024

item.title: 温迪-威廉姆斯（Wendy Williams）纪录片制作人称，他们在拍摄大部分场景时并不知道她患有痴呆症
item.description:
Wendy Williams documentary producers say they didn't know she had dementia while filming most scenes https://t.co/xXRBUThnlO
